summary: Dreaming of an actress future, a young girl arrives in Paris. Her personality awakens a glowing passion of several different men.
cast: Lambert Wilson|Juliette Binoche|Wadeck Stanczak|Jean-Louis Trintignant|Dominique Lavanant|Jean-Louis Vitrac|Jacques Nolot|Anne Wiazemsky|Olimpia Carlisi|Caroline Faro|Katsumi Furukata|Arlette Gordon|Philippe Landoulsi|Madeleine Marie|Serge Martina|Michèle Moretti|Annie Noël|Patrick Pérez|Joseph Michael Roth
title: La cita
